snippet: With an outbreak of finger-pointing signaling trouble in his campaign, Mitt Romney plans to say more clearly what he wants for the country, his aides said.
abstract: Mitt Romney plans to begin an offensive seeking to give voters a clearer picture of where he wants to take the country even as an outbreak of finger-pointing signals trouble in his presidential campaign; will present a series of events and ads promoting his five-point economic policy.

byline.original: By JIM RUTENBERG and JEFF ZELENY
byline.contributor: Michael Barbaro, Michael D. Shear and Ashley Parker contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: With an outbreak of finger-pointing signaling trouble in his campaign, Mitt Romney plans to say more clearly what he wants for the country, his aides said.

headline.seo: Amid Discord, Romney Seeks to Sharpen Message
headline.main: Amid Discord, Romney Seeks to Sharpen Message
headline.print_headline: Amid Discord, Romney Seeks to Sharpen Message on His Agenda
